review: Very easy to install. Lots of choices a little searching among the various categories.

review: I love it! I got it as a Christmas gift and I use it all the time. Way better than paying for cable

review: This is the best product I have ever purchased. It was easily installed and activated very quickly. A very inexpensive way to watch a myriad of programs at little cost. Thank you Amazon for once again exceeding my expectations.
